name: Cygnus (TeamOrange)
description:
Look up at the stars and they will guide you home…

Instructions
Use the left and right arrow keys to move sideways and collect the stars of the constellations.

Team comment
We had a great time making our game and we’re excited to share it with you! After brainstorming and developing different ideas, we decided to create something inspired by Greek mythology, with an astrological twist. We incorporated the theme by positioning the protagonist on a boat, sailing down a symbolic River Styx (the gateway between our world and the underworld in Greek myth). The player controls the protagonist’s boat as they collect stars and form constellations while reminiscing about the loved ones who have shaped their life.
